Room.Name: Oceancrest Memorial Fountain Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the west end of the circular path around the large fountain.
Room.LongDescription: The fountain is one of the first things most visitors to Oceancrest see when they enter the town, if they travel along Main. This larger-than- life fountain is very inspiring to both young and old alike. The circular path continues to the northeast and southeast. The fountain is to the east, where you can occasionally see young children playing in. Regalia Drive continues to the west.
